name: .IBT File Extension
summary: Learn about .IBT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Contains textures and models used by the "Thief: Deadly Shadows" video game, also known as "Thief 3;" installed along with other Thief 3 game files and required for the game to run.

content: Thief: Deadly Shadows was developed by Ion Storm using the Unreal Engine. It was published by Eidos.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
